title: Isle of bounty
creator_credit: Movietonenews, Australian National Film Board and Frank Coffey
brief_description: A study of the sub-tropical island where some of the crew of the famous Bounty mutiny settled and married Polynesian wives - Norfolk Island, one of the many Pacific Islands north-east of Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Movietonenews, Australian National Film Board and Frank Coffey
description: A study of the sub-tropical island where some of the crew of the famous Bounty mutiny settled and married Polynesian wives - Norfolk Island, one of the many Pacific Islands north-east of Australia.
